item.title: Adjust your Attitude
item.description: Welcome to Attitude For The Cloud! What is this blog? This is a blog dedicated to helping Engineers working in the Cloud to become better and utilize the Cloud better rather you are a DevOps Engineer, Software Engineer, Platform Engineer, or {Enter Buzzword Here} Engineer. Why the name? “It is your attitude, more than your aptitude, that will determine your altitude.” - Zig Ziglar In aviation, your attitude is the pitch of your plane.
